name: Blasting Bad
description:
Blasting Bad is a game which takes heavy inspiration from the clasic game "Wrecking Crew", Except, this time arround, you play as everybody's favourite character; Anton.

Beware of the happy hours and the dangers you will find along the way on your blasting adventure.
